item.title: P-I dueling+trading dupe
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

Well, players in a project insanity source, after winning a duel, can mass click the ‘Claim’ button and recieve more then double there prizes, is there something I can do to fix this?

Like make like a 2.5 or 3 second click delay timer to claim a reward, also with x-amount item and mass clicking an item to recieve more then what you have.

This may help, with thieving actionhandler it says

case 6163: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(1897, 10, 1); break; case 6165: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(950, 30, 25); break; case 6166: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(1635, 60, 50); break; case 6164: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(7650, 100, 75); break; case 6162: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(1613, 170, 90);
And under that it just does another case… I don’t get it, thieving has a click delay…

Read full topic
